member.name: DeviceTypes
member.summary: Describes the DLNA device types that are supported by the Media Streaming API.

summary.para: DLNA Digital Media Renderer (DMR). The value is equivalent to the device type urn:schemas-upnp-org:device:MediaRenderer:1.
DLNA Digital Media Server (DMS). The value is equivalent to the device type urn:schemas-upnp-org:device:MediaServer:1.
